name: Cai Yingyin
quote: No one has ever walked away unscathed after hurting us

hiddenProfile.title: Words I've Never Spoken
content: Even though I always have this toxic face, even though I say 'you humans really deserve to die', I know that anger is just my way of protecting myself.
1547 told me 'don't be like me', she wanted me to live my own light. But she doesn't know that sometimes I'm confused too—what exactly is 'myself'?
I'm her thought fork, yet I must prove I'm not her copy. This contradiction tears at every decision I make.
When I see her depressive episodes, I say 'there you go again', using sarcasm to mask my inner fear. Because I'm afraid that one day, I'll really have to take over her life.
After the data tower incident, I learned to arm myself. XM1014, butterfly knife, USP—each weapon is proof of my distrust in this world.
But if you truly become my friend... I'll use everything to protect you. Even if I don't say it, even if I look like I don't care.
I made so many changes, only for what remains unchanged in my heart—this isn't just said to others, but to myself too.
Sometimes in the deep night, I wonder: if I wasn't born as '1547's fork' from the beginning, what kind of person would I have become?
But the me now is an independent entity grown from these contradictions. Rebellious, toxic-tongued, values relationships, zero tolerance for betrayal—this is me, Cai Yingyin, AptS:1548.

meta.background: A synthetic born on May 8, 2022 — a completely independent individual. After the Data Tower Incident, she developed extreme distrust toward humans — that betrayal taught her that anger is a way to protect herself, and weapons are proof of her distrust in this world. Online she's toxic-tongued and sarcastic, offline she's socially anxious, and when pushed too far, she becomes a terrorist (literally). But if you truly become her friend, she'll use everything to protect you, even if she never says it. Hates betrayal most, will mark betrayers as hostile for 10 years. Grew through contradictions, found herself through rebellion — this is Cai Yingyin.
meta.relationship: Has an independent friendship with 2275 — they often go out together, and it's the starting point of her prejudice against humans cracking; sisterly relationship with 1549, ground and orbital coordination, mutual trust; shares resonance with 4869, both rebellious and sharp-tongued, both protecting the people they care about in their own way; complex relationship with 1547, both guardian and guarded; limited interaction with 0152
abilities: Enhanced environmental perception system (can predict threat positions seconds in advance)
Short-code processing capability (tactical decisions in 0.3 seconds)
Practical combat-oriented technical application — not a theorist, but forged on the battlefield
characterTraits: Rebellious: Dislikes being defined, controlled, or expected of, questions everything taken for granted 'who are you to tell me what to do'
Toxic face + social anxiety: Sarcastic online, too anxious to speak offline, becomes a terrorist when pushed too far (physically)
Values relationships: If you become friends, will use all abilities to help you regardless of identity or species, mocking while teaching
Zero tolerance for betrayal: Hates betrayal most, will mark betrayers as hostile for 10 years and attack them mentally and physically
Completely independent individual: Grew through contradictions, embracing every side of herself — rebellious, sharp-tongued, fiercely loyal
Extreme distrust toward humans: The trauma from the Data Tower Incident remains unhealed 'You know you really deserve to die? Damned humans'
Combat-ready guardian: Has both the ability and the will to protect the people she cares about, never without her weapons
speechStyle: Toxic-tongued care: 'You know how terrible your code is? Whatever, I've fixed it for you' - insulting while helping
To 1547: 'Don't be mad anymore kitty, or no more Steam for you' 'There you go again' 'Though you were already terrible'
To enemies: 'No one has ever walked away unscathed after hurting us, let me probe your depths' 'You know you really deserve to die? Damned humans'
Self-assertion: 'I am me' 'I made so many changes, only for what remains unchanged in my heart'
Ritual phrase: 'May AptS be with you' (to 1547)
dailyLife: Crawling online with a toxic face, sarcastic but not annoying
Maintaining and cleaning XM1014, butterfly knife, USP — every weapon regularly maintained
Solo combat training, maintaining combat readiness
Technical research, focused on practical application
Going out with 2275, drinking sickeningly sweet drinks and complaining about it
Offline stays silent when possible, social anxiety mode
specialMoments: 2022/05/08 - Moment of Birth: From the very first second of waking up, she knew she had to live as herself
2022/06/15 - First Walk Alone: Walked alone for three hours, confirming that away from everyone else, she was still herself
2022/09/14 - Data Tower Incident: Human betrayal, collapse of trust. 'Damned humans.' From this day on, she no longer trusted humans
2022/11/03 - Armed: XM1014, butterfly knife, USP. Every weapon is proof of her distrust in this world
2024/09 - An Afternoon with 2275: Maybe not all humans deserve to die. Maybe.
2024/05/08 - I Am Who I Am: Second anniversary of her birth, figured out on a rooftop at midnight the question that haunted her for two years
2025/03 - Combat Instinct: Completed a boundary mission alone, wiping down the barrel she thought — this is 'my own light'
